Title: Chapter XXIV: Leopard Catches Cloud
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Matt Lambert
Actors: Daniel Wu, Emily Beecham, Aramis Knight, Orla Brady
Plot: Sunny and Bajie arrive at Pilgrim's Fortress, only to face an angry M.K.; The Widow enlists Gaius; Moon and Lydia rally the troops.
